api_list.name: Get All climate change news
api_list.description: This return all climate news found
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climatechange2.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climatechange2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get from individual newspaper
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climatechange2.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climatechange2.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
